project_copy: I Worked on the development and design of a number of promotional micro-sites for Canon USA with 14-Forty in Los Angeles. These campaigns were unique in that they invited retailers nationwide to take part in promoting key new product releases. We were tasked not only with the design of the sites, but also in developing a system that allowed over 50 retailers to add custom flourishes to their personal version. Below are two links for the most recent campaigns, the imagePROGRAPH Pro Series campaign is currently live and the Canon Genius campaign ran in 2015.
